statements: SELECT * FROM project_updates;
SELECT id, update_message FROM project_updates WHERE backer_id = 1;
SELECT update_message, update_date FROM project_updates WHERE id = 5;
SELECT id, update_message, update_date FROM project_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT id, update_message FROM project_updates WHERE update_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM project_updates WHERE id = 1;
SELECT update_message, update_date FROM project_updates WHERE backer_id = 100 ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT id, update_message FROM project_updates WHERE backer_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY id ASC, update_message DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_updates, backer_id FROM project_updates GROUP BY backer_id HAVING total_updates > 5;
SELECT * FROM project_updates WHERE update_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM backers WHERE backer_contribution > 1000;
SELECT backer_name, backer_email FROM backers WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM backers WHERE backer_contribution > 1000;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(backer_id) AS backers_count FROM projects JOIN backers ON projects.project_id = backers.project_id GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT project_name, backer_name, backer_contribution FROM projects JOIN backers ON projects.project_id = backers.project_id WHERE project_name LIKE '%data%';
SELECT project_name, AVG(backer_contribution) AS avg_contribution FROM projects JOIN backers ON projects.project_id = backers.project_id GROUP BY project_id HAVING AVG(backer_contribution) > 5000;
SELECT * FROM project_updates;
SELECT update_message, update_timestamp, project_id FROM project_updates ORDER BY update_timestamp DESC;
SELECT backer_name, backing_amount FROM backers WHERE backing_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM communications WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT backer_name, backer_email FROM backers WHERE backer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM project_updates ORDER BY update_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT project_id, update_message FROM project_updates WHERE project_id = 12345;
SELECT backer_name, backing_amount FROM backers WHERE backing_amount > 1000 ORDER BY backing_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT project_id, sender_name, message_subject FROM communications WHERE project_id = 54321 ORDER BY communication_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT backer_id, backer_name, backer_email FROM backers WHERE backer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY backer_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM project_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM projects WHERE project_status = 'Active';
SELECT full_name, email FROM backers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT communication_type, communication_date, communication_content FROM communications WHERE project_id = 'c3b4d97b-48d7-4820-bd6f-a8967df9437d';
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE project_status != 'Completed' ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM project_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC, project_id LIMIT 10;
SELECT project_name, project_status FROM projects WHERE project_status='Active';
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM backers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT project_name, project_description, communication_date FROM projects JOIN communications ON projects.project_id = communications.project_id;
SELECT * FROM project_updates WHERE project_id IN (SELECT project_id FROM projects WHERE project_status='Inactive');
SELECT * FROM project_updates;
SELECT project_id, update_date FROM project_updates WHERE update_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT backer_id, backer_name FROM backers ORDER BY backer_name DESC;
SELECT sender, receiver, communication_date FROM communications WHERE sender = 'Alice';
SELECT project_id, commenter_name, comment_text FROM project_comments WHERE comment_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT update_id, update_date, update_content FROM project_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT backer_name, backer_email FROM backers WHERE backer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY backer_name;
SELECT sender, receiver, communication_date FROM communications WHERE sender = 'Alice' AND receiver = 'Bob' ORDER BY communication_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, SUM(pledge_amount) AS total_pledged FROM project_backers GROUP BY project_id ORDER BY total_pledged DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT project_id, commenter_name, comment_text, comment_date FROM project_comments WHERE comment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY comment_date;
